## Which skill or command?

Name the existing skill or command you want to improve.

## What problem does this solve?

Describe the limitation or pain point.

## Proposed solution

How should it work? Be specific.

## Alternatives considered

Other approaches you've thought about.

## Additional context

Examples, links to documentation, or other relevant information.
